Reviews.Title: Amazing
Reviews.Author: Happy purchaser
Reviews.Content: I was a bit skeptical on ordering this item at first because of all the websites that offered and what not, the seller i bought this from used a website called ec-firstclass.org, which appears to be fake, don't worry it isnt fake, just has very crappy html coding, so dont be alarmed if this site ends up being your tracking site, this item showed up a month before the estimated date, i do recommend charging it fully for about 2 hours before first use "mine appeared to have a 60% charge after 30 mins of charging and depleted quickly" when this thing is charged fully for a long ammount of time, the battery life is 100% correct, i played sonic adventure 2 on the reicast emulator for 6 hours straight before the 14% battery warning light came on, it is very powerful, i have both a shield and this, this thing puts my shield to shame, i got mine from riipoo, a very kind and very helpful seller, i recommend him 100%

Reviews.Title: its not very good
Reviews.Author: Crystal
Reviews.Content: It freezes often and gets way to warm on the back, whatever you do dont set it down while its on the heat will build up and fry it.
